headline: Nike Rounds Out Management Team With New Head of Communications
summary: The sports brand has hired McDonald's executive Michael Gonda as chief communications officer.

raw.headline: Nike Rounds Out Management Team With New Head of Communications
raw.summary: The sports brand has hired McDonald's executive Michael Gonda as chief communications officer.

headline: NIKE, Inc. Appoints Michael Gonda as Executive Vice President and Chief Communications Officer
summary: BEAVERTON, Ore., June 02, 2025--NIKE, Inc. (NYSE:NKE) announced today that Michael Gonda will become Executive Vice President and Chief Communications Officer of NIKE, Inc., effective July 7, 2025. In this role, Gonda will lead the global communications organization, overseeing all facets of the communications strategy, including storytelling, corporate and brand reputation, issues management, and employee engagement. As a member of the company’s Senior Leadership Team, Gonda will report to Pres

headline: Kizik taps Nike vet as CEO
summary: Gareth Hosford, who held leadership positions at the athletics giant and Converse, will lead the hands-free footwear brand and its parent company.

raw.headline: Kizik taps Nike vet as CEO
raw.summary: Gareth Hosford, who held leadership positions at the athletics giant and Converse, will lead the hands-free footwear brand and its parent company.

headline: EXCLUSIVE: Kizik Names Former Nike Exec Gareth Hosford as Its New CEO
summary: Monte Deere, who has led the company since 2019, will continue to serve on the board of Kizik, and its parent company HandsFree Labs.

raw.headline: EXCLUSIVE: Kizik Names Former Nike Exec Gareth Hosford as Its New CEO
